column5: After being introduced to steelheading on Dec. 15, I've become addicted! Every chance I get, I'm scouting tribs, reading articles, buying equipment and fishing..... The past week has been great: catching fish off piers and hooking into a few on the streams. Fishing has now become a 12 month event..... Enjoy the pics and enjoy your time outdoors! Until next time, Cheese

awesome stuff bud! great catch! i'm going to be heading out next week... just started fishing for salmon a few years back and didn't know they were game at this time of year. gonna give it a shot for the first time at this time of year next week! can't wait!
Congrads on your catch. I'm kinda like you, but I was officially introduced to Steelhead 1 week ago. Mind if I ask what bait/lure you like to use the most?
Great fish there!  I also was introduced to steelhead fishing the week of Christmas.  I've been out as often as I can as well...sure is addicting isn't it?? LOL.
